long_description: The Timbuk2 Showdown daypack is all about comfort and convenience-backpack-style carrying while you're on the move gives way to Swing Around(TM) laptop access once you've stopped. Swing the pack around without taking it off to access your laptop from the full-length side zipper; padded, tricot-lined compartment carries up to a 15 in. laptop. Large zippered main compartment. Exterior stretch side pocket carries your water bottle or U-lock, both sold separately. Multiple exterior zippered pod pockets hold electronic gadgets, power cubes, cables and other accessories such as keys, wallet, change, pens, phone, iPod(R) and earbuds. Bottom compression straps cinch the Showdown pack for a slimmer profile, or they expand to carry a jacket or yoga mat. On-strap Timbuk2 bottle opener; top carry handle offers convenient toting. Ventilated back panel provides breathable comfort for your back; strap design provides a shaped, true and comfortable fit. Timbuk2 Showdown daypack is made from a refined-weave 840 ballistic nylon for durable wear.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Showdown daypack is all about comfort and convenience-backpack-style carrying while you're on the move gives way to Swing Around(TM) laptop access once you've stopped.
